column7: Lucapa Diamond Company Limited is an Australia-based company engaged in the mining and exploration of diamond projects in Angola. The company is focused on diamond mining, evaluation and exploration interests in Africa and was founded in 2004.
African Medallion Group produces exclusive gold products including gold Krugerrand, medallions and gold bullion coins. The firm was founded in 2017 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
Holcim Group, formerly known as LafargeHolcim, is a building materials firm. The company was formed by the merger of Holcim and Lafarge in July 2015. It is headquartered in Jona, Switzerland.
column39: Lafarge South Africa, Lephema Executive Group

column7: Mergence Investment Managers is an independent asset management company, providing investment management services for institutional and individual investors. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.
